MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power fault in CH41 postcode area of Birkenhead, affecting properties in Simpson Street and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  5:51PM. Our engineers are on their way to the area to investigate and repair the fault  and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 9PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at  6:02PM on 11th January 2021
